title: The Adventures of David Perry: The Guiding Light
summary: Over the course of a week, David Perry discovers his powers of influence and guidance, using them to advert danger and guide his community.
summaryGerman: Im Laufe einer Woche entdeckt David Perry seine Kräfte der Einflussnahme und Führung, um Gefahren abzuwenden und seiner Gemeinschaft den Weg zu weisen.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt David Perry zijn krachten van invloed en begeleiding, waarmee hij gevaar afwendt en zijn gemeenschap leidt.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, David Perry découvre ses pouvoirs d'influence et de guidance, les utilisant pour écarter le danger et guider sa communauté.

story.text: David Perry, a passionate advertiser with a knack for guiding tours, finds himself feeling unexplained energetic waves throughout his body while conducting a presentation.
David discovers he can influence people's emotions and decisions subtly. He experiments with calming an impatient client and is thrilled with the positive effects.
While leading a historical city tour, eerie sensations guide David to a hidden underground passage, revealing lost artifacts of the city.
Utilizing his newfound guidance abilities, David helps a lost child find her parents in a crowded festival, feeling an immense sense of peace and purpose.
David's abilities become well-known, and he's asked to help negotiate a crucial community deal, where his influence leads to a happy agreement among parties.
His day off turns romantic when he uses his guiding light to create a perfect surprise date for his partner, enhancing their mutual attraction.
Gathering trusted friends, David forms a team dedicated to using their various abilities for the greater good of their city, feeling utterly epic as they plan their future.

ending: Thus, David Perry transforms from an advertising expert into the Guiding Light of the city, finding his true calling in life.
moral: The power to influence and guide others should be used wisely and for the common good.
